definition: to go against the rules (of a religious order)/to break a ban (e.g. medical)
to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)
to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)

sentences.english: I ask him not to break the commandments.

definition: to violate a religious precept/to smoke or drink after giving up
(Buddhism) to adhere strictly to the ethical precepts/asceticism
to take oaths as a monk (Buddhism)/to take orders
to take the life of a living creature
to end abstinence/to resume (drinking) after a break/to break (a taboo)
to abstain from/to prohibit (certain foods etc)
to return to normal life (leaving a monastic order)
